Observed at: Wawa Airport 1:00 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers at times heavy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers or flurries beginning near noon. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
